timeline.event: Dillon Dunteman attends Harvard University, B.S. Mechanical Engineering
timeline.details: Senior thesis on vision software for micro-robotic bees, quantum computing coursework
timeline.relevance: Technical expertise foundation, thought leadership credentials

timeline.event: Dillon works as Investor at Firmament Group
timeline.details: Venture arm buildout, enterprise SaaS buyouts

timeline.event: Dillon researches quantum computing at Firmament, cold-emails/calls 120+ founders
Dillon connects with Cambridge Quantum Computing (CQC) CEO Ilyas Khan
Firmament invests ~$660K in Cambridge Quantum (CQC) convertible note
timeline.details: ~$20M round, Dillon's role described as 'personally sourced and underwrote'
timeline.relevance: First venture investment claim, Quantinuum investment timing

timeline.event: Dillon launches Substack 'Prescience' (tagline: 'Precursor to Hyperion')
Dillon joins Vista Equity Partners
timeline.details: Growth equity role at $100B+ AUM firm

timeline.event: Dillon publishes 'Anticipating Disruptive Innovation' on Substack (pinned post)
timeline.relevance: Thought leadership timing - AFTER first investment

timeline.event: Dillon 'originally started researching fusion energy' while at Firmament
timeline.timing_concern: Dillon joined Vista Sept 2021, so if 'late 2021' this is inaccurate

timeline.event: CQC convertible note converts to equity at $244M valuation
CQC merges with Honeywell Quantum to form Quantinuum
timeline.details: Major validation event, market leader emergence

timeline.event: Dillon publishes 'Deep-Dive #2: Nuclear Fusion' on Substack
timeline.relevance: Fusion thought leadership, timing relative to investments
timeline.timing_concern: Need to verify if fusion investments preceded or followed this article

timeline.event: Dillon 'began angel investing' per LP Letter
timeline.relevance: Portfolio performance baseline, angel investing phase start

timeline.event: Dillon publishes 'Deep-Dive #3: Solid-State Batteries' on Substack
Brett Adcock founds Figure AI, self-funds with $100M
timeline.relevance: Figure AI context, early positioning claim

timeline.event: Dillon 'began to dive deeper into humanoid robotics space'
timeline.relevance: Figure AI early positioning claim, timing relative to investment
key_claim_linkage: KEY Claim 4.3: Figure AI early positioning
timeline.timing_concern: Vague timing, investment followed 1-3 months later (April 2023)

timeline.event: Dillon invests $40K in Figure AI Series A at $420M post-money
timeline.details: Sourced through 'close relationship with partners at Tamarack Global'
timeline.relevance: Major investment, early positioning claim, sourcing relationship
timeline.timing_concern: Series A announced May 2023, just 1 month later - suggests participation in institutional round

timeline.event: Dillon meets Normal Computing CEO Faris Sbahi at NYC networking event
Figure AI announces Series A ($70M) led by Parkway Venture Capital
timeline.details: Public Series A announcement, 1 month after Dillon investment
timeline.timing_concern: Only 1 month after Dillon investment - questions 'non-consensus' claim

timeline.event: Dillon assists Normal Computing with hiring, commercial strategy, financial modeling
timeline.details: Referred 2 key early hires, commercial and financial support

timeline.event: Dillon introduced to Dirac CEO Fil Aronshtein by VC who passed on investment
timeline.relevance: VC deal flow claim, Dirac sourcing

timeline.event: Dillon invests $20K in Dirac pre-seed SAFE at $15M valuation cap
Dillon introduces Dirac CEO to 'friend at Founders Fund'
Dillon introduces Dirac CEO to GTM advisors, hires, top VCs (Founders Fund, Thrive, DCVC)
key_claim_linkage: KEY Claim 2.5: Making deeptech legible for VCs

timeline.event: Dillon advises Dirac CEO to pass on seed term sheet at <$20M valuation
Figure AI raises $675M Series B at $2.6B post-money valuation
timeline.details: Bezos ($100M), Microsoft ($95M), NVIDIA ($50M), OpenAI Startup Fund
timeline.relevance: Major validation, consensus benchmark, 6.2x increase in 9 months

timeline.event: Quantinuum raises $300M at $5.3B post-money
Dirac seed round closes
timeline.details: $6M per dataroom OR $10.7M per public PR (Coatue & Founders Fund co-lead) - DISCREPANCY

timeline.event: Normal Computing raises Series A
timeline.details: $17M per dataroom (Drive Capital lead) OR $35M total seed per public sources - DISCREPANCY

timeline.event: Dillon helps Normal with Series A raise
timeline.details: Financial model, diligence answers, term sheet negotiations

timeline.event: Normal CEO offers Dillon advisory role with ~$80K equity award

timeline.event: Figure AI unveils Figure 02 humanoid robot with enhanced capabilities
Normal Computing's CN101 thermodynamic chip tapes out
Figure AI raises Series C $1B+ at $39B valuation
timeline.details: $2.6B → $39B = 15x increase in 19 months, Tamarack Global participates
timeline.relevance: Major valuation outcome, Tamarack relationship continuity

Dataroom claims Dirac has 'pilots with Anduril, Stellantis, Lockheed Martin'

Fusion article April 2022, but fusion investment dates unknown

timing_concerns.details: LP Letter says mid-2022, but Quantinuum claimed as personal investment (March 2020)
timing_concerns.implication: Quantinuum may be institutional (Firmament), not personal angel investment

key_patterns: Most portfolio investments occurred in 2023, shortly before 2024 mega-rounds
All major case studies have founder testimonials in dataroom, but ZERO public mentions found
Sourcing claims (cold outreach, networking, VC referrals) all from Tier 1 sources
Performance based on latest-round markups (often overvalued), not exits
Thought leadership appears to follow, not precede, major investment actions
verification_priorities: CRITICAL: Verify Dirac-Founders Fund introduction (Nov 2023) - key GP value-add claim
CRITICAL: Verify when fusion investments occurred relative to April 2022 article
HIGH: Verify Normal advisory role and equity award (July 2024)
HIGH: Verify Figure AI Tamarack relationship depth (primary sourcing claim)
MEDIUM: Verify exact Substack launch date and quantum article date vs Quantinuum investment
MEDIUM: Verify Vista deal attribution and specific role
notes: Timeline has 47 events, but only 6 of 24 portfolio companies represented
High-risk claims rely entirely on Tier 1 sources with no independent verification
Timing gaps and contradictions suggest potential retroactive narrative construction
